Reviews.Title: Sensitive, works extremely well
Reviews.Author: Tim Allen
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical about this unit, but it was included in the security package I purchased so I tried it out.  I'm glad I did.  This unit works as advertised.  Recommended.

Reviews.Title: Nice ad on
Reviews.Author: WV upgrader
Reviews.Content: I added 2 of these to my garage. Each one is covering 3 Windows on each side. 20 foot range so be sure were there going before you order. 360 coverage is cool too can put overhead in center if you want. Cover all windows in room. I moved a motion detector and put these up. Keep a cat inside. Instructions are good. Thay came with mine. Just have a installer or dealer code. Can not get into system program without. Thats were the main learns the sincor.

Reviews.Title: Quality Sensor
Reviews.Author: ANTHONY JACKSON
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised. Trips and received by control panel. GE products have given me safety and security continuously.  Would buy again.
